name: SimpleMathFacts
0:
”Alexa open simple math facts”
”Alexa ask simple math facts to start a new game”
”Alexa ask simple math facts to start over”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple math facts
des: Simple Math Facts will ask you 5 simple addition questions. The numbers are random between 0 and 12. The skill will tell you if you answered correctly or not. At the end of the 5 questions it will give you the number of questions you answered correctly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
